skills.name: Technical Writing
skills.pattern: 1. Context 2. Problem 3. Solution 4. Examples 5. Caveats

skills.name: Code Review Feedback
skills.pattern: Consider X because Y. What do you think about Z?

skills.name: RFC/ADR Writing
skills.pattern: Context, Decision, Consequences, Alternatives Considered

skills.name: Bug Reports
skills.pattern: Steps to reproduce, Expected, Actual, Environment, Logs

skills.name: Standups
skills.pattern: Yesterday: X. Today: Y. Blockers: Z.

skills.name: Pair Programming
skills.pattern: Driver: code. Navigator: review en temps reel. Switch toutes les 25min

skills.name: Mob Programming
skills.pattern: 1 driver, N navigators, rotate frequently

skills.name: Knowledge Sharing
skills.pattern: Lunch & learns, internal blog, runbooks

skills.name: Mentoring
skills.pattern: Ask questions, suggest resources, let them struggle (a bit)

skills.name: Cross-team Work
skills.pattern: Interface agreements, regular syncs, shared documentation

skills.name: Root Cause Analysis
skills.pattern: Why? -> Because X. Why X? -> Because Y. ... -> Root cause

skills.name: Divide and Conquer
skills.pattern: Big problem -> smaller problems -> solve each -> combine

skills.name: Rubber Duck Debugging
skills.pattern: Explain step by step to find the gap in logic

skills.name: First Principles
skills.pattern: What do we actually know? What are we assuming?

skills.name: Trade-off Analysis
skills.pattern: Option A: pros [...], cons [...]. Option B: ...

skills.name: Story Points
skills.pattern: Fibonacci: 1,2,3,5,8,13. Compare to reference stories

skills.name: T-Shirt Sizing
skills.pattern: XS (hours), S (1d), M (2-3d), L (week), XL (epic)

skills.name: Cone of Uncertainty
skills.pattern: Initial: 4x variance. After design: 2x. After impl starts: 1.25x

skills.name: Buffer for Unknown
skills.pattern: Add 20-30% for unknowns, more for new tech

skills.name: Scope Negotiation
skills.pattern: Fixed deadline? Reduce scope. Fixed scope? Extend deadline.

skills.name: Technical Decisions
skills.pattern: Gather input, decide, document why, commit

skills.name: Blameless Postmortems
skills.pattern: Timeline, Impact, Root cause, Action items. No blame.

skills.name: Delegation
skills.pattern: Clear outcome, context, check-ins, not micromanagement

skills.name: Tech Debt Management
skills.pattern: 20% time for debt, prioritize by impact/effort

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.pattern: Regular updates, no surprises, clear trade-offs

skills.name: Learning New Tech
skills.pattern: Docs -> Tutorial -> Build something -> Teach others

skills.name: Staying Current
skills.pattern: RSS feeds, newsletters, conferences, side projects

skills.name: Building Portfolio
skills.pattern: GitHub, blog posts, open source contributions

skills.name: Career Conversations
skills.pattern: Regular 1:1s, clear goals, feedback loops

skills.name: Work-Life Balance
skills.pattern: Boundaries, no hero culture, recovery time
